100 REM Set $C000 bank to Video RAM
101 A=IN(243)
110 OUT 243,20
120 REM Load data
130 LOAD"tiledata.bin",-16384
140 REM Set palette
150 FOR I=0TO31
160 OUT I*256+235,PEEK(-4096+I)
170 NEXT
180 OUT 224,8
190 OUT 231,129
191 OUT 232,128
192 X=0:Y=0
193 X=X+1:Y=Y+2
194 OUT 228,X AND 255:OUT229,X/256:OUT 230,Y AND 255
200 IF INKEY$="" GOTO 193
201 OUT 232,1
